    Product Details

    Goes-everywhere-with-everything sweater.

    We mean it when we say our Supima® cotton cardigan goes everywhere and with everything. Why are we so confident? Its made from superior Supima® cotton which creates resilient yarns that last, retains color better and has a refined weight to keep you comfortable year round. It fits close enough to the body to give you the perfect shape, weekday to weekend and back again. 76% cotton/20% nylon/4% spandex. Machine wash. Imported.

    Features

    • Classic crew neckline 
    • Long sleeves, faux shell button front 
    • Hits at mid-hip

    America’s finest cotton - your favorite layer.

    Here’s an essential imbued with qualities few others provide these days. Because we use Supima® — the top 3% of America’s cotton crop — spun with stretch, this shell is exceptionally soft, drapey and resilient. It’s also a comfortable weight to layer year-round, and works beautifully with our Supima cardigans. Supima cotton/nylon/Lycra spandex. Machine wash. Imported.

      Perfect Cotton Cardigan!

      I was looking for a Classic "Cotton" Cardigan, and this style is perfect! The Cotton is a nice light-to-medium weight, suitable for Spring, Summer, and Fall seasons. It is 76% Cotton, with just enough Nylon and Spandex, to help keep its shape. I'm 5' 3" / Size 8, and I ordered the Petite Medium (to allow for a little shrinkage). It fits perfectly and looks great on! If this is a style you're looking for, I highly recommend!
